scripts.shopify:deploy: shopify theme push -n --ignore config/settings_data.json templates/*.json sections/*.json locales/*.json --store=sungs-sandbox
scripts.shopify:deploy-new: npm-run-all -s vite:build shopify:pull-content && shopify theme push --unpublished --store=sungs-sandbox
scripts.shopify:pull: shopify theme pull --ignore config/*.json sections/*.json templates/*.json locales/*.json
scripts.shopify:pull-content: shopify theme pull -n --only config/*.json templates/*.json sections/*.json locales/*.json --store=sungs-sandbox
scripts.shopify:push: shopify theme push --ignore config/*.json sections/*.json templates/*.json locales/*.json
